Name: Deskmate Girl
About the game: Hello, here is the producer of this game 'Deskmate Girl'. We are a very small team. And due to some reasons, the first and second programmer has both quitted this project during the development was still going. I had no choice but to learn programming by myself and finish the programming with the only tiny knowledge I've got. The game appeared to have a lot of bugs, i had to delete some contents for solving some problems. However, there're still some bugs remaining. I deeply appologize for this. At least at the very beginning, we really wanted to make a game which everyone could enjoy. We hope that you can give this game a try. The game has a content which can be gone through in less than an hour. So you'll have enough time for requesting the refund. 'You will have a better experience after the intimacy reaches 70' You can find more extensions in the player community. It is recommended that you add DLC to unlock more content for a complete game experience. Introduction 《Deskmate Girl》 is a galgame. Record the sweetest memories of you and your girlfriend, and spend a happy campus life together! Features Play easily Interesting conversation Fantastic CG Wonderful music Our translation may not be accurate. If you are willing to help us improve our translation, please contact us. Thank you for your support. This is the first game we made. There are many things that need to be improved in our work. If you encounter errors or other problems in the game, we hope you can contact us and hope you and other players can have a better gaming experience.
